text: Gladman is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Brett J. Gladman (born 1966), Canadian astronomer *Constance Helen Gladman (1922–1964), Australian Roman Catholic nun *Frederick John Gladman (1839–1884), Australian educator and writer *Ken Gladman (born 1946), Australian rules footballer *Malcolm Gladman (1915–1987), Australian politician *Marjorie Gladman (1908–1999), American tennis player *Renee Gladman (born 1971), American poet and writer *Rod Gladman (born 1968), Australian rules footballer ==See also== *7638 Gladman, a main-belt asteroid
title: Gladman
